text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +4 Attack.

name: Saddlemaster

name: Exploding Bloatbat

name: Dire Frenzy

name: Wing Blast
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).

name: Hyena Alpha

name: Dragonbane

name: Gryphon
text: Rush

name: Scrap Shot
text: Deal 3 damage. Give a random Beast in your hand +3/+3.

name: Krolusk Barkstripper
text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.

name: Houndmaster
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +4/+4 and Taunt.

name: Infested Wolf
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Spiders.

name: Equip Windrunner's Bow
text: Hero Power Equip Windrunner's Bow.

name: Dire Frenzy
text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
flavorText: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.

name: Corpse Widow

flavorText: An emerald stone for Tauren hands Who sought its strength to save their lands Their tribes now lost, their rage released Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: Carrion Drake

text: Poisonous Rush Poisonous, Rush

name: Hunting Party

name: Wyvern
text: Rush

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Summon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.

text: Deathrattle: Summon two 4/4 Hyenas.

text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.

name: Call of the Wild
text: Summon all three Animal Companions.

text: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.

text: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.

name: Babbling Book
text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.

name: Babbling Book
text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavorText: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.

name: Shooting Star
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavorText: Literally starstruck.

name: Snap Freeze
text: Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, destroy it.

text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.

name: Fireblast
text: Hero Power Deal 1 damage.

name: Fireblast Rank 2
text: Hero Power Deal 2 damage.

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice

name: Flamecannon
text: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.

name: Pyros

name: Shimmering Tempest

name: Ruby Spellstone
text: Add 2 random Mage spells to your hand.

name: Snap Freeze
text: Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, destroy it.
flavorText: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

name: Astral Rift
text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
flavorText: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

name: Celestial Emissary
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn has Spell Damage +2.
flavorText: Casting with the stars.

name: Research Project
text: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your Hero Power also targets adjacent minions.
flavorText: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.
flavorText: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Magic Dart Frog
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

name: Mana Cyclone
text: Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavorText: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

name: Ancient Mysteries
text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
flavorText: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

name: Arcane Flakmage
text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

name: Ascendant Scroll
text: Hero Power Add a random Mage spell to your hand. It costs (2) less.

name: Malygos's Explosion
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

name: Apexis Smuggler
text: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
flavorText: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

name: Astromancer Solarian
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

name: Evocation
text: Fill your hand with random Mage spells. At the end of your turn, discard them.
flavorText: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

name: Incanter's Flow
text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by (1).
flavorText: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

name: Starscryer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
flavorText: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

name: Cram Session
text: Draw 1 (card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon three times as many.

name: Confection Cyclone
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your hand.
flavorText: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

name: Conjure Mana Biscuit
text: Add a Biscuit to your hand that refreshes 2 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: So THIS is why she was AFK.

name: Deck of Lunacy
text: Transform spells in your deck into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavorText: Voted "Most Lunacy" in Madness Monthly magazine.

name: Game Master
text: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
flavorText: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

name: Arcanologist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
flavorText: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

name: Fallen Hero
text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.
flavorText: And he can't get up.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Playing this card makes you SMARTER. And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavorText: Hey man, that's cold. Literally and metaphorically.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavorText: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Ice Barrier
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
flavorText: This is Rank 1. Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavorText: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran. How do you make a Dalaran float? Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Mirror Entity
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Spellbender
text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavorText: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild. It just feels meaner. And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavorText: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card. We may never know the truth.

name: Black Cat
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, draw a card.
flavorText: She's so odd, you can't even.

name: Ice Block
text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
flavorText: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

name: Duplicate
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
flavorText: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!

name: Soot Spewer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

name: Flamewaker
text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

name: Effigy
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavorText: Burning man, brah.

name: Polymorph: Boar
text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
flavorText: It's always Huffer.

name: Spellslinger
text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
flavorText: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about. Who can say?

name: Forgotten Torch
text: Deal 3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
flavorText: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation? It's one of life's many mysteries.

name: Roaring Torch
text: Deal 6 damage.

name: Twilight Flamecaller
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

name: Manic Soulcaster
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
flavorText: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

name: Potion of Polymorph
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a 1/1 Sheep.
flavorText: Tastes like Baaaaananas.

name: Volcanic Potion
text: Deal 2 damage to all minions.
flavorText: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

name: Mana Bind
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
flavorText: Nice spell. YOINK!

name: Coldwraith
text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
flavorText: He's freezing his bones off!

name: Doomed Apprentice
text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
flavorText: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

name: Frozen Clone
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to your hand.
flavorText: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Simulacrum
text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavorText: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Explosive Runes
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal 6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
flavorText: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

name: Cinderstorm
text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

name: Stargazer Luna
text: After you play the right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavorText: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

name: Unexpected Results
text: Summon two random 2-Cost minions (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

name: Pyromaniac
text: Whenever your Hero Power kills a minion, draw a card.
flavorText: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

name: Splitting Image
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

name: Messenger Raven
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage minion.
flavorText: You can make a collect CAW!

name: Dune Sculptor
text: After you cast a spell, add a random Mage minion to your hand.
flavorText: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

name: Flame Ward
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

name: Chenvaala
text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Elemental.
flavorText: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

name: Malygos's Intellect
text: Draw 4 cards.

name: Arcane Amplifier
text: Your Hero Power deals 2 extra damage.
flavorText: Not on good terms with warlocks.

name: Imprisoned Observer
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

name: Netherwind Portal
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavorText: More aromatic than a regular portal.

name: Flamewaker
text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

name: Combustion
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Any excess damages both neighbors.
flavorText: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

name: Firebrand
text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavorText: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

name: Glyph Guardian
text: Whenever this attacks, double its Attack.

name: Glyph Guardian
text: Whenever this attacks, triple its Attack.

name: Rigged Faire Game
text: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
flavorText: What's faire is fair.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Playing this card makes you SMARTER. And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.
flavorText: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavorText: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Ice Barrier
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
flavorText: This is Rank 1. Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Mirror Entity
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 6 damage.
flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Polymorph
text: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
flavorText: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavorText: Don't summon a water elemental at a party. It'll dampen the mood.

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.
flavorText: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Ethereal Arcanist
text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

name: Echo of Medivh
text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
flavorText: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

name: Goblin Blastmage
text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

name: Wee Spellstopper
text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

name: Dalaran Aspirant
text: Inspire: Gain Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Is he aspiring or inspiring? Make up your mind!

name: Animated Armor
text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavorText: Try putting it on. Wait, let me get my camera.

name: Demented Frostcaller
text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
flavorText: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

name: Molten Reflection
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
flavorText: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

name: Steam Surger
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
flavorText: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

name: Ghastly Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
flavorText: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.

name: Leyline Manipulator
text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
flavorText: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

name: Arcane Keysmith
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
flavorText: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

name: Vex Crow
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavorText: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

name: Cosmic Anomaly
text: Spell Damage +2
flavorText: INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF, BLUE 1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

name: Scorch
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Costs (1) if you played an Elemental last turn.
flavorText: The hoof. The hoof. The hoof is on fire.

name: Conjurer's Calling
text: Twinspell Destroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
flavorText: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

name: Conjurer's Calling
text: Destroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3 Your spells cost (1) more.
flavorText: The math checks out!

name: Azure Explorer
text: Spell Damage +2 Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavorText: Has an appetite for knowledge!

name: Malygos's Fireball
text: Deal 8 damage.

name: Iceball
text: Deal 6 damage.

name: Occult Conjurer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

name: Ring Toss
text: Discover a Secret and cast it. Corrupt: Discover 2 instead.
flavorText: If you liked it, then you shoulda put a ring on it!

name: Ring Toss
text: Corrupted Discover 2 Secrets and cast them.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 6 damage.
flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavorText: Don't summon a water elemental at a party. It'll dampen the mood.

name: Polymorph: ???
text: Choose a minion. Discover a new minion to transform it into.

name: Dragon's Breath
text: Deal 4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavorText: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy? It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

name: Flame Lance
text: Deal 8 damage to a minion.
flavorText: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

name: Ethereal Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

name: Cabalist's Tome
text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
flavorText: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

name: Cryomancer
text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

name: Time Warp
text: Take an extra turn.

name: Deck of Wonders
text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
flavorText: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

name: Dragon's Fury
text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavorText: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

name: Scroll of Wonder
text: Casts When Drawn Cast a random spell.

name: Bonfire Elemental
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, draw a card.
flavorText: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

name: Curio Collector
text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

name: Blast Wave
text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Overkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavorText: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

name: Cloud Prince
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
flavorText: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

name: Naga Sand Witch
text: Battlecry: Change the Cost of spells in your hand to (5).
flavorText: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover an upgraded Mage spell.
flavorText: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

name: Rolling Fireball
text: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to the left or right.
flavorText: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

name: Apexis Blast
text: Deal 5 damage. If your deck has no minions, summon a random 5-Cost minion.
flavorText: Lonely mages can still have a blast!

name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

name: Wyrm Weaver
text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/3 Mana Wyrms.
flavorText: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

name: Firework Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Corrupt: Deal 12 instead.
flavorText: The brightest spark can still go dark.

name: Firework Elemental
text: Corrupted Battlecry: Deal 12 damage to a minion.

name: Aegwynn, the Guardian
text: Spell Damage +2 Deathrattle: The next minion you draw inherits these powers.
flavorText: With Medivh as her son, nothing YOU do could ever disappoint her.

name: Ethereal Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

name: Blizzard
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavorText: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Coldarra Drake
text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
flavorText: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

name: Faceless Summoner
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavorText: They never get the recognition they deserve.

name: Kabal Crystal Runner
text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this game.
flavorText: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

name: Meteor
text: Deal 15 damage to a minion and 3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavorText: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

name: Pyros
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand as a 10/10 that costs (10).

name: Aluneth
text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
flavorText: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

name: Toki, Time-Tinker
text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion from the past to your hand.
flavorText: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

name: Meteorologist
text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

name: Arcanosaur
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Arcane energy… finds a way.

name: Reno the Relicologist
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavorText: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

name: Highborne Sorcerer
text: Spell Damage +2 Battlecry: Draw 3 spells.

name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Draw (card, cards). (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
flavorText: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

name: Coldarra Drake
text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
flavorText: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
flavorText: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor. This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Flame Leviathan
text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
flavorText: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

name: Firelands Portal
text: Deal 5 damage. Summon a random 5-Cost minion.
flavorText: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

name: Greater Arcane Missiles
text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal 3 damage each.
flavorText: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

name: Inkmaster Solia
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
flavorText: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

name: Astromancer
text: Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your hand size.
flavorText: All signs point to Antonidas.

name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
text: Change the Cost of minions in your deck to (1).
flavorText: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
text: Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

name: Dragoncaster
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavorText: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

name: Malygos's Flamestrike
text: Deal 8 damage to all enemy minions.

name: Animated Avalanche
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

name: Mask of C'Thun
text: Deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Hide in the mask, but it will wear you. Through its gleaming eye, you shall see true.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Rhonin
text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
flavorText: A masterless shamurai.

name: Anomalus
text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.
flavorText: That's short for "Anomnomnomnomalus".

name: Glacial Mysteries
text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: The secret is in the frosting.

name: Sindragosa
text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
flavorText: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

name: Hex Lord Malacrass
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
flavorText: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

name: Power of Creation
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
flavorText: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell in your deck and cast it with random targets.
flavorText: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Mana Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this game that didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

name: Deep Freeze
text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
flavorText: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

name: Grand Finale
text: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
flavorText: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

name: Frost Lich Jaina
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
flavorText: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

name: Dragoncaller Alanna
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
flavorText: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

name: Solarian Prime
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Cast 5 random Mage spells (targets enemies if possible).

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal 10 damage.
flavorText: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: The Amazing Reno
text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*

name: Forbidden Healing
text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
flavorText: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

name: Val'anyr Reequip Effect Dummy
text: It is a dummy card for holding a effect to play when reequipping Val'anyr (LOOT 500)

name: First Day of School

flavorText: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: Blessing of Might
text: Give a minion +3 Attack.
flavorText: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Hand of Protection
text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavorText: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Hand of Salvation
text: Secret: When your second minion dies in a turn, return it to life.

name: Humility
text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavorText: This card makes something really damp. Oh wait. That's "Humidity."

name: Light's Justice
flavorText: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
flavorText: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

name: Eye for an Eye
text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavorText: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavorText: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time. It’s a mystery!

name: Repentance
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavorText: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Avenge
text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
flavorText: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force". Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

name: Competitive Spirit
text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
flavorText: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself. Or kill all the competitors.

name: Sacred Trial
text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
flavorText: You have chosen poorly.

name: Divine Strength
text: Give a minion +1/+2.
flavorText: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

name: Selfless Hero
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

name: Vilefin Inquisitor
text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'

name: Getaway Kodo
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
flavorText: Get to da Kodo! Now!

name: Grimscale Chum

name: Meanstreet Marshal
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.

name: Smuggler's Run
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

name: Adaptation
text: Adapt a friendly minion.
flavorText: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

name: Lost in the Jungle

flavorText: George and Karl were never heard from again.

name: The Last Kaleidosaur
text: Quest: Cast 6 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
flavorText: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

name: Righteous Protector
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

name: Hidden Wisdom
text: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

name: Autodefense Matrix
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
flavorText: We call it the bubble machine.

name: Crystology
text: Draw two 1-Attack minions from your deck.
flavorText: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

name: Glow-Tron
text: Magnetic
flavorText: They tried for weeks to make a stealth version, but eventually decided to just let it glow.

name: Bloodclaw
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

name: Desperate Measures
text: Twinspell Cast a random Paladin Secret.
flavorText: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

name: Desperate Measures
text: Cast a random Paladin Secret.

name: Never Surrender!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2 Health.
flavorText: But sometimes concede.

name: Brazen Zealot
text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.

name: Righteous Cause
text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions. Reward: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavorText: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

name: Sand Breath
text: Give a minion +1/+2. Give it Divine Shield if you're holding a Dragon.
flavorText: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

name: Aldor Attendant
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (1) this game.
flavorText: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

name: Imprisoned Sungill
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, summon two 1/1 Murlocs.
flavorText: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

name: Avenge
text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
flavorText: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force". Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

name: Honor Student
text: Taunt

name: Shield of Honor
text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

name: Wave of Apathy
text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
flavorText: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

name: Righteous Protector
text: Taunt Divine Shield

name: Selfless Hero
text: Deathrattle: Give 2 random friendly minions Divine Shield.

name: Oh My Yogg!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
flavorText: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Avenge
text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
flavorText: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force". Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavorText: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

text: Secret: After an enemy minion deals 3 or more damage, destroy it.

name: Righteous Protector
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

name: Holy Light
text: Restore 6 Health.
flavorText: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Reinforce
text: Hero Power Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.

name: The Silver Hand
text: Hero Power Summon two 1/1 Recruits.

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.

name: Seal of Light
text: Restore 4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.

name: Shielded Minibot
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.

name: A Light in the Darkness
text: Discover a minion. Give it +1/+1.
flavorText: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark? If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

name: The Tidal Hand
text: Hero Power Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Murloc.

name: Grimestreet Outfitter
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.

text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.

name: Desperate Stand
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
flavorText: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

name: Drygulch Jailor

flavorText: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

name: Greater Pearl Spellstone
text: Summon a 6/6 Spirit with Taunt.

name: Guardian Spirit
text: Taunt

name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. (Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
flavorText: In ages old, when Ancients broke Azari of the Legion spoke To tempt the mortals: gems of power The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

name: Pearl Spellstone
text: Summon a 4/4 Spirit with Taunt.

name: Potion of Heroism
text: Give a minion Divine Shield. Draw a card.
flavorText: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

name: Cathedral Gargoyle
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Fly like an eagle, drop like a rock.

text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.

name: Lightforged Blessing
text: Give a friendly minion Lifesteal.

text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.

name: Subdue
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.

name: Air Raid

name: Shotbot
text: Reborn
flavorText: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

text: Give a minion +2/+2. Draw a card.

name: Libram of Wisdom
text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add a 'Libram of Wisdom' spell to your hand."
flavorText: The best wisdom is passed on.

name: Murgur Murgurgle
text: Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

name: Argent Braggart
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack and Health to match the highest in the battlefield.
flavorText: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

name: Micro Mummy
text: Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +2 Attack.

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavorText: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Snack Run
text: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavorText: "I'll have two monster churros, a combo box of Yogg-Saron, and one of those turkey legs that ate the Silver Hand Recruit."

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavorText: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs. I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Holy Light
text: Restore 8 Health to your hero.
flavorText: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Pursuit of Justice
text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavorText: "Is this about justice or just us?"

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavorText: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Sword of Justice
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.

name: Divine Favor
text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.

name: Coghammer
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
flavorText: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

name: Muster for Battle
text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavorText: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Scarlet Purifier
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
flavorText: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

name: Seal of Champions
text: Give a minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

name: Warhorse Trainer
text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
flavorText: He doesn't even get Sundays off. Every day he's hostling.

name: Rallying Blade
text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
flavorText: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

name: Steward of Darkshire
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.

name: Small-Time Recruits

flavorText: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly. "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster." BOOM, promoted.

name: Howling Commander
text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine Shield minion from your deck.
flavorText: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

name: Benevolent Djinn
text: At the end of your turn, restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Wish 1: funnel cakes. Wish 2: funnel cakes. Wish 3: FUNNEL CAKES.

name: Blessed Maul
text: Battlecry: Give your minions +1 Attack.

name: Champion's Maul
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.

text: Battlecry: Give your minions Divine Shield.

name: Sacred Maul
text: Battlecry: Give your minions Taunt.

name: Paragon of Light

name: High Priest Thekal
text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1 of your Hero's Health into Armor.

name: Bronze Herald

name: Commander Rhyssa

flavorText: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

name: Goody Two-Shields

text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.

name: Arrogant Crusader

name: Chillblade Champion

name: Guardian Spirit
text: Taunt

text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.

text: Magnetic Divine Shield Taunt

name: Blessing of Kings
text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavorText: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy. But it smells a little, too.

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
