name: Solemn Vigil
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavorText: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.

name: Tuskarr Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

name: Stand Against Darkness
text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavorText: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Grimestreet Enforcer
text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

name: Galvadon
text: Battlecry: Adapt 5 times.

name: Bolvar, Fireblood
text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: He's so hot right now.

name: Call to Arms
text: Recruit 3 minions that cost (2) or less.
flavorText: More personal than a text to arms.

name: Ghostly Charger
text: Divine Shield Rush
flavorText: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

name: Prince Liam
text: Battlecry: Transform all 1-Cost cards in your deck into Legendary minions.
flavorText: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

name: Glowstone Technician
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: "Windell! More light!" "I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

name: Mechano-Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
flavorText: When you need more iron in your diet.

name: Shrink Ray
text: Set the Attack and Health of all minions to 1.
flavorText: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

name: Farraki Battleaxe
text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

name: Dragon Speaker
text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavorText: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Duel!
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck. They fight!
flavorText: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Amber Watcher
text: Battlecry: Restore 8 Health.
flavorText: Healing really resin-ates with him.

name: Scalelord
text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
flavorText: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

name: Aldor Truthseeker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
flavorText: It’s under 'T.'

name: Libram of Justice
text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavorText: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

name: Blessing of Authority
text: Give a minion +8/+8. It can't attack heroes this turn.
flavorText: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

name: High Abbess Alura
text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
flavorText: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

name: Bolvar, Fireblood
text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +4 Attack.

name: Mechano-Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 16/16 Robosaur.

name: Carousel Gryphon
text: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
flavorText: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

name: Carousel Gryphon
text: Corrupted Divine Shield, Taunt

name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
flavorText: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

name: Stand Against Darkness
text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavorText: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Avenging Wrath
text: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

name: Enter the Coliseum
text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
flavorText: You have to get past the vendors first. So many are lost to shopping...

name: Mysterious Challenger
text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

name: Ivory Knight
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavorText: Do NOT call it a "horse".

name: Spikeridged Steed
text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
flavorText: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

name: Sunkeeper Tarim
text: Taunt Battlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
flavorText: Ironically, his favorite number is 4.

name: Blackguard
text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

name: Crystal Lion
text: Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each Silver Hand Recruit you control.
flavorText: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

name: Guardian Spirit
text: Taunt

name: Level Up!
text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavorText: Ding! Grats.

name: Val'anyr
text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
flavorText: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
flavorText: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

name: Mysterious Challenger
text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

name: Devout Pupil
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
flavorText: He considers textbooks Light reading.

name: Judicious Junior
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: She's judge, jury, and junior!

name: Hammer of the Naaru
text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavorText: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Holy Elemental
text: Taunt

name: Guardian of Kings
text: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Eadric the Pure
text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions' Attack to 1.
flavorText: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

name: Grimestreet Protector
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Divine Shield.
flavorText: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

name: Vinecleaver
text: After your hero attacks, summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavorText: George and Karl! Thank the Light we found you!

name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
text: Battlecry: Cast each spell you cast on your minions this game on this one.
flavorText: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

name: Kangor's Endless Army
text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
flavorText: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless." - Countess Ashmore

name: A New Challenger...
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

name: Lightforged Crusader
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
flavorText: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Lady Liadrin
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
flavorText: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Commencement
text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

name: Libram of Judgment
text: Corrupt: Gain Lifesteal.
flavorText: You really can't judge a book by its cover.

name: Libram of Judgment
text: Corrupted Lifesteal

name: Guardian of Kings
text: Taunt Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore 8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
text: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

name: Dinosize
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
flavorText: Comes with fries and a drink.

name: Grave Vengeance
text: Lifesteal

name: Silver Sword
text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
flavorText: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

name: Tip the Scales
text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavorText: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Ancient Guardian
text: Taunt Divine Shield

name: Murgurgle Prime
text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Summon 4 random Murlocs. Give them Divine Shield.

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, set the defender's Attack and Health to 3.
flavorText: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: High Exarch Yrel
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
flavorText: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
flavorText: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

name: Libram of Hope
text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

name: Anyfin Can Happen
text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
flavorText: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavorText: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
text: Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells.
flavorText: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.

name: Power Word: Shield
text: Give a minion +2 Health.
flavorText: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Circle of Healing
text: Restore 4 Health to ALL minions.
flavorText: It isn't really a circle.

name: Shadow of Nothing
text: Mindgames whiffed! Your opponent had no minions!

name: Silence
text: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

name: Forbidden Shaping
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
flavorText: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

name: Topsy Turvy
text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
flavorText: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

name: Regenerate
text: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Forbidden Words
text: Spend all your Mana. Destroy a minion with that much Attack or less.
flavorText: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Lazul's Scheme
text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by 1 until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavorText: "What's that you're dreaming? You're weak and you're screaming! It must be my scheming..."

name: Whispers of EVIL
text: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

name: Raise Dead
text: Deal 3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
flavorText: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

name: Desperate Prayer
text: Restore 5 Health to each hero.
flavorText: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...

name: Holy Smite
text: Deal 3 damage to a minion.
flavorText: It doesn't matter how pious you are. Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Mind Vision
text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavorText: I see what you did there.

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Radiance
text: Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Because you're worth it!

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavorText: Good idea: Buffing your minions. Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Scarlet Subjugator
text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your next turn.
flavorText: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.

name: Northshire Cleric
text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavorText: They help the downtrodden and distressed. Also they sell cookies.

name: Light of the Naaru
text: Restore 3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
flavorText: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

name: Shadowbomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to each hero.
flavorText: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

name: Twilight Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
flavorText: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore 5 Health.
flavorText: Flash! Ahhhhhhh~

name: Power Word: Glory
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding. Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

name: Pint-Size Potion
text: Give all enemy minions -3 Attack this turn only.
flavorText: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

name: Potion of Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavorText: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

name: Awaken the Makers
text: Quest: Summon 7 Deathrattle minions. Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
flavorText: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

name: Binding Heal
text: Restore 5 Health to a minion and your hero.
flavorText: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

name: Crystalline Oracle
text: Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

name: Psionic Probe
text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

name: Chameleos
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
flavorText: He's everyone you want to be.

name: Cloning Device
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

name: Test Subject
text: Deathrattle: Return any spells you cast on this minion to your hand.
flavorText: “Now I feel... REALLY icky.”

name: Spirit of the Dead
text: Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, shuffle a 1-Cost copy of it into your deck.
flavorText: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

name: Zombie
text: Taunt

name: Activate the Obelisk
text: Quest: Restore 15 Health. Reward: Obelisk's Eye.
flavorText: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

name: Embalming Ritual
text: Give a minion Reborn.
flavorText: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

name: Disciple of Galakrond
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

name: Cleric of Scales
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavorText: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Taunt
flavorText: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Reliquary of Souls
text: Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

name: Renew
text: Restore 3 Health. Discover a spell.
flavorText: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

name: Draconic Studies
text: Discover a Dragon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavorText: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavorText: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Crimson Clergy
text: After a friendly character is healed, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He won't drop the ball.

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore 5 Health.
flavorText: Flash! Ahhhhhhh~

name: Focused Will
text: Silence a minion, then give it +3 Health.
flavorText: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

name: Holy Smite
text: Deal 3 damage to a minion.
flavorText: It doesn't matter how pious you are. Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Generous Spirit
text: Choose a friendly minion. Give it to your opponent and draw 3 cards.

name: Heal
text: Hero Power Restore 4 Health.

name: Lesser Heal
text: Hero Power Restore 2 Health.

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
flavorText: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
text: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
flavorText: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavorText: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Lightwell
text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Mind Spike
text: Hero Power Deal 2 damage.

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Divine Spirit
text: Double a minion's Health.
flavorText: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

name: Mind Blast
text: Deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

name: Shadowboxer
text: Whenever a minion is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

name: Shrinkmeister
text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

name: Resurrect
text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"

name: Confuse
text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
flavorText: This minion is really powerful!

name: Convert
text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
flavorText: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

name: Wyrmrest Agent
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority 1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

name: Museum Curator
text: Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavorText: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.

name: Embrace the Shadow
text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavorText: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

name: Purify
text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
flavorText: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!

name: Mana Geode
text: Whenever this minion is healed, summon a 2/2 Crystal.
flavorText: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

name: Radiant Elemental
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavorText: It's a literal lava lamp!

name: Shadow Visions
text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
flavorText: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

name: Shadow Ascendant
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

name: Spirit Lash
text: Lifesteal Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

name: Voidform
text: Hero Power Deal 2 damage. After you play a card, refresh this.

name: Divine Hymn
text: Restore 6 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

name: Squashling
text: Echo Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavorText: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

name: Dead Ringer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck.
flavorText: Shortstop on N'zoth's softball team.

name: Auchenai Phantasm
text: Battlecry: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavorText: “Okay kids did everyone remember to heal before we left?”

name: Seance
text: Choose a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavorText: “The spirits spoke to me.” "What did they say?" "You had lethal two turns ago."

name: EVIL Conscripter
text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: Kobold! There’s a place you can handle I said kobold! When you’re short in the candle Cast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

name: Shadowy Figure
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavorText: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

name: Grandmummy
text: Reborn Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

name: Holy Ripple
text: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Restore 1 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: I still prefer the taste of banana fudge ripple.

name: Obelisk's Eye
text: Hero Power Restore 3 Health. If you target a minion, also give it +3/+3.

name: Penance
text: Lifesteal Deal 3 damage to a minion.
flavorText: This is what happens when you don’t give a sincere apology.

name: Envoy of Lazul
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
flavorText: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

name: Galakrond's Wit
text: Hero Power Add a random Priest minion to your hand.

name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
flavorText: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

name: Sethekk Veilweaver
text: After you cast a spell on a minion, add a Priest spell to your hand.
flavorText: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

name: Power Word: Feast
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
flavorText: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

name: Insight
text: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavorText: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Insight
text: Corrupted Draw a minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavorText: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
flavorText: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadowform
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavorText: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Thrive in the Shadows
text: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing!" —Tauren joke

name: Shadow Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavorText: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

name: Shadowform
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
flavorText: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Dark Cultist
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.

name: Velen's Chosen
text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

name: Shadowfiend
text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavorText: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

name: Kabal Talonpriest
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

name: Curious Glimmerroot
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
flavorText: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

name: Mirage Caller
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavorText: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

name: Acolyte of Agony
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

name: Dragon Soul
text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
flavorText: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

name: Elixir of Hope
text: Give a minion +2/+2 and "Deathrattle: Return this minion to your hand."

name: Elixir of Life
text: Give a minion +2/+2 and Lifesteal.

name: Elixir of Purity
text: Give a minion +2/+2 and Divine Shield.

name: Elixir of Shadows
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.

name: Gilded Gargoyle
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavorText: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

name: Twilight Acolyte
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
flavorText: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

name: Twilight's Call
text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavorText: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

name: Unidentified Elixir
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Vivid Nightmare
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it with 1 Health remaining.
flavorText: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

name: Extra Arms
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Add 'More Arms!' to your hand that gives +2/+2.
flavorText: All the better to hug you with!

name: More Arms!
text: Give a minion +2/+2.

name: Omega Medic
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavorText: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

name: Sand Drudge
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt.
flavorText: Loves long walks on the beach, raising the dead, and chocolates.

name: Surrender to Madness
text: Destroy 3 of your Mana Crystals. Give all minions in your deck +2/+2.
flavorText: Never give up, always surrender!

name: Madame Lazul
text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Wretched Reclaimer
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavorText: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

name: Breath of the Infinite
text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
flavorText: It's called "circular breathing."

name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
flavorText: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

name: Dark Prophecy
text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
flavorText: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

name: Apotheosis
text: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
flavorText: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

name: Dragonmaw Overseer
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavorText: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

name: Mindrender Illucia
text: Battlecry: Swap hands and decks with your opponent until your next turn.
flavorText: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

name: Fairground Fool
text: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +4 Health.
flavorText: "What did Illidan say when his rocketeer broke down on the Darkmoon racetrack? YOU ARE NOT REPAIRED!"

name: Fairground Fool
text: Corrupted Taunt

name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
text: After you cast a spell, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

name: Palm Reading
text: Discover a spell. Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Actual palms not required.

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavorText: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Shadowed Spirit
text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: They can't all be grim grinning ghosts.

name: Holy Nova
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell. Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavorText: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavorText: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Mass Dispel
text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavorText: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Mindgames
text: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavorText: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: Auchenai Soulpriest
text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
flavorText: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

name: Holy Champion
text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: She really likes seeing people get better. That's why she hurts them in the first place.

name: Spawn of Shadows
text: Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavorText: What did you expect to happen? He's a Spawn. Of Shadows.

name: Hooded Acolyte
text: Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavorText: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

name: Shadow Word: Horror
text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

name: Shifting Shade
text: Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

name: Priest of the Feast
text: Whenever you cast a spell, restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!

name: Greater Healing Potion
text: Restore 12 Health to a friendly character.
flavorText: Filled with electrolytes!

name: Tortollan Shellraiser
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: A hero... In a half-shell.

name: Eternal Servitude
text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
flavorText: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

name: Duskbreaker
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavorText: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavorText: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: High Priest Amet
text: Whenever you summon a minion, set its Health equal to this minion's.
flavorText: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

name: Psychopomp
text: Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
flavorText: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Fate Weaver
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

name: Grave Rune
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
flavorText: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

name: Brittlebone Destroyer
text: Battlecry: If your hero's Health changed this turn, destroy a minion.
flavorText: Broke many a leg in drama class.

name: Cabal Acolyte
text: Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

name: Disciplinarian Gandling
text: After you play a minion, destroy it and summon a 4/4 Failed Student.
flavorText: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

name: Tortollan Shellraiser
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +2/+2.

name: Auspicious Spirits
text: Summon a random 4-Cost minion. Corrupt: Summon a 7-Cost minion instead.
flavorText: "I'm not AWE-spicious, but I am a little spicious."

name: Auspicious Spirits
text: Corrupted Summon a random 7-Cost minion.

name: Lightsteed
text: Your healing effects also give affected minions +2 Health.
flavorText: All the steed, half the calories.

name: The Nameless One
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavorText: Used to be called " , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: Holy Nova
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell. Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavorText: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavorText: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Glitter Moth
text: Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, double the Health of your other minions.
flavorText: Some moths are attracted to flame. This one's attracted to disco.

name: Upgraded Repair Bot
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4 Health.
flavorText: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

name: Vol'jin
text: Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
flavorText: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

name: Excavated Evil
text: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Shuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!

name: Darkshire Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Restore 5 Health.
flavorText: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

name: Power Word: Tentacles
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavorText: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

name: Twilight Darkmender
text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavorText: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

name: Onyx Bishop
text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.

name: Drakonid Operative
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's deck.
flavorText: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

name: Kabal Songstealer
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

name: Raza the Chained
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Hero Power costs (0) this game.
flavorText: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

name: Amara, Warden of Hope
text: Taunt Battlecry: Set your hero's Health to 40.

name: Lyra the Sunshard
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
flavorText: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

name: Devour Mind
text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavorText: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

name: Holy Water
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavorText: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

name: Quartz Elemental
text: Can't attack while damaged.
flavorText: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

name: Power Word: Replicate
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
flavorText: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

name: Reckless Experimenter
text: Deathrattle minions you play cost (3) less, but die at the end of the turn.
flavorText: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

name: Mass Hysteria
text: Force each minion to attack another random minion.
flavorText: Black Friday gets worse every year.

name: Convincing Infiltrator
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
text: At the end of your turn, restore 5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: Used to carrying for his team.

name: Chronobreaker
text: Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

name: Time Rip
text: Destroy a minion. Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: "It's time. R.I.P."

name: Psyche Split
text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
flavorText: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

name: Vol'jin
text: Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
flavorText: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Corrupt cards in your hand and deck by (2).
flavorText: Fear is the mind-killer, and also the name of my wurm.

name: Fortune Teller
text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: "I see a giant piano in your future."

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Cabal Shadow Priest
text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

name: Holy Fire
text: Deal 5 damage. Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Entomb
text: Choose an enemy minion. Shuffle it into your deck.
flavorText: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.

name: Herald Volazj
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
flavorText: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

name: Dragonfire Potion
text: Deal 5 damage to all minions except Dragons.
flavorText: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

name: Embrace Darkness
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, gain control of it.
flavorText: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

name: Shadow Essence
text: Summon a 5/5 copy of a random minion in your deck.
flavorText: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

name: Coffin Crasher
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.
flavorText: Also does weddings.

name: Lady in White
text: Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire' on every minion in your deck (set Attack equal to Health).
flavorText: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

name: Zerek, Master Cloner
text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
flavorText: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

name: Aeon Reaver
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to a minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Initiation
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavorText: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Ghastcoiler
text: Deathrattle: Summon 4 random Deathrattle minions.

name: Ghastcoiler
text: Deathrattle: Summon 2 random Deathrattle minions.

name: Prophet Velen
text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavorText: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

name: Confessor Paletress
text: Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavorText: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears. Most common fear: Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

name: Archbishop Benedictus
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of your opponent's deck into your deck.
flavorText: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

name: Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 3 different friendly minions.

name: Greater Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 4 different friendly minions.

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavorText: A diamond, white, this stone the eighth A precious jewel for those of faith A whispered prayer restores the lost But none among them know the cost.

name: Psychic Scream
text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Everybody! Hit the deck!

name: Temporus
text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
flavorText: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

name: Nightscale Matriarch
text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3 Whelp.
flavorText: Everywhelp, get in here!

name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
text: Battlecry: Draw 1-Cost minions from your deck until your hand is full.
flavorText: Everyone's dying to meet him.

name: Galakrond, Azeroth's End
text: Battlecry: Destroy 4 random enemy minions. Equip a 5/2 Claw.

name: Galakrond, the Apocalypse
text: Battlecry: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. ( )

name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
text: Battlecry: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. ( )
flavorText: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

name: Reliquary Prime
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Only you can target this with spells and Hero Powers.

name: Skeletal Dragon
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, add a Dragon to your hand.
flavorText: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

name: Soul Mirror
text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
flavorText: It’s a doppelgang-war!

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavorText: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: Free From Amber
text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
flavorText: Bingo! Minion DNA!

name: Shadowreaper Anduin
text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavorText: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

name: Princess Talanji
text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

name: Catrina Muerte
text: At the end of your turn, summon a friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Murozond the Infinite
text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last turn.
flavorText: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Flesh Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
flavorText: "A BIG mistake."

name: G'huun the Blood God
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

name: Idol of Y'Shaarj
text: Summon a 10/10 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavorText: Without a tongue, it speaks in seven. Without a voice, its echo lingers forever.

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavorText: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: Obsidian Statue
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
text: Summon a 1/1 copy of each minion in your deck.
flavorText: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

name: Mass Resurrection
text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died this game.
flavorText: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

name: Plague of Death
text: Silence and destroy all minions.
flavorText: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

name: Blood of G'huun
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavorText: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

name: Mind Control
text: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavorText: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Grave Horror
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.

name: Backstab
text: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavorText: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavorText: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavorText: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance. Crowds love it.

name: Counterfeit Coin
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

name: Death's Shadow
text: Passive Hero Power During your turn, add a 'Shadow Reflection' to your hand.

name: Shadow Reflection
text: Each time you play a card, transform this into a copy of it.

name: Backstab
text: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavorText: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavorText: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavorText: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance. Crowds love it.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavorText: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells. Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison? Poison Elemental? Nobody wants that.

name: Sinister Strike
text: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: There's something about this strike that just feels off. Sinister, even.

name: Smoke Bomb
text: Give a minion Stealth until your next turn. Draw a card.

name: Pilfer
text: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavorText: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.

name: Conceal
text: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
flavorText: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions. You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

name: Buccaneer
text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
flavorText: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

name: Pit Snake
text: Poisonous
flavorText: It could be worse. It could be a Snake Pit.

name: Bladed Cultist
text: Combo: Gain +1/+1.
flavorText: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

name: Bloodthistle Toxin
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.

name: Briarthorn Toxin
text: Give a minion +3 Attack.

name: Fadeleaf Toxin
text: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.

name: Firebloom Toxin
text: Deal 2 damage.

name: Journey Below
text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavorText: Don't stop believing there's something below.

name: Kingsblood Toxin
text: Draw a card.

name: Swashburglar
text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavorText: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"

name: Hallucination
text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
flavorText: It's the good kind of hallucination.

name: Razorpetal
text: Deal 1 damage.

name: The Caverns Below
text: Quest: Play five minions with the same name. Reward: Crystal Core.
flavorText: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

name: Doomerang
text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to your hand.
flavorText: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

name: Leeching Poison
text: Give your weapon Lifesteal this turn.
flavorText: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

name: Kingsbane
text: Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
flavorText: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

name: Pogo-Hopper
text: Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other Pogo-Hopper you played this game.
flavorText: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

name: Radioactive Ooze
text: Poisonous Rush

name: Serrated Tooth
text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
flavorText: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

name: Daring Escape
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavorText: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 1 (copy, copies) of it into your deck. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavorText: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Bazaar Burglary
text: Quest: Add 4 cards from other classes to your hand. Reward: Ancient Blades.
flavorText: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

name: Pharaoh Cat
text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your hand.
flavorText: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

name: Plague of Madness

text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to your hand.

text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.

text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.

name: Assassin's Blade
flavorText: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin. Certificate of authenticity included.

text: Destroy an enemy minion.
