flavorText: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Darkglare
text: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana Crystal.
flavorText: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

name: Felstorm
text: Hero Power Deal 1 damage to all non-Demon minions.

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, give all minions in your hand +2/+1.
flavorText: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
text: Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

name: Renounce Darkness
text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
flavorText: SEE YA DARKNESS!

name: Boneweb Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavorText: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

name: Soul Shear
text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavorText: "Just a little off the sides please."

name: Vulgar Homunculus
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.

name: Midway Maniac
text: Taunt
flavorText: Faire owners hate him! Learn his secrets with one simple spell!

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
text: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavorText: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 2)
text: Summon two 3/2 Imps. (Upgrades when you have 10 Mana.)

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 3)
text: Summon three 3/2 Imps.

name: Drain Soul
text: Lifesteal Deal 3 damage to a minion.
flavorText: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Drain Life
text: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.
flavorText: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Shadow Bolt
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion.
flavorText: It’s a Bolt. It's made out of Shadow. What more do you need to know!

name: Felguard
text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Yes, he'll fight for you. BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Sense Demons
text: Draw 2 Demons from your deck.
flavorText: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

name: Void Terror
text: Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Demonwrath
text: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavorText: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavorText: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

name: Darkshire Councilman
text: After you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: Democracy in action!

name: Spreading Madness
text: Deal 9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
flavorText: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

name: Silverware Golem
text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
flavorText: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.

name: Bloodfury Potion
text: Give a minion +3 Attack. If it's a Demon, also give it +3 Health.
flavorText: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

name: Unlicensed Apothecary
text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

name: Chittering Tunneler
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavorText: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

name: Howlfiend
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a random card.
flavorText: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

name: Treachery
text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to your opponent.
flavorText: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

name: Unwilling Sacrifice
text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

name: Duskbat
text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavorText: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

name: Ratcatcher
text: Rush Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
flavorText: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

name: Doubling Imp
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavorText: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

name: Nethersoul Buster
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
flavorText: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

name: Reckless Diretroll
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your lowest Cost card.
flavorText: "Reck less!? ME WRECK MOAR!"

name: Impferno
text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

name: Rafaam's Scheme
text: Summon 1 1/1 (Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
flavorText: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

name: EVIL Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
flavorText: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

name: Neferset Thrasher
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

name: Dark Skies
text: Deal 1 damage to a random minion. Repeat for each card in your hand.
flavorText: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

name: Dragonblight Cultist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond. Gain +1 Attack for each other friendly minion.
flavorText: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

name: Chaos Gazer
text: Battlecry: Curse a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
flavorText: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavorText: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

name: Released Soul
text: Rush

name: School Spirits
text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavorText: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

name: Shadowlight Scholar
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
flavorText: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Imp.

name: Soul Juggler
text: After a friendly Demon dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.

name: Soul Juggler
text: After a friendly Demon dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion twice.

name: Backfire
text: Draw 3 cards. Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: "That's the last time I let an imp spit gasoline into my car."

name: Free Admission
text: Draw 2 minions. If they're both Demons, reduce their Costs by (2).
flavorText: "Quick, get in before someone sees you, or worse, someone sees me."

name: Man'ari Mosher
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +3 Attack and Lifesteal this turn.
flavorText: "E.T.C. is sooo mainstream. Have you heard of Blight Boar?"

name: Revenant Rascal
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mana Crystal for each player.
flavorText: Turns out his face really did get stuck that way.

name: Void Terror
text: Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Hellfire
text: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters.
flavorText: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Pit Lord
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Shadowflame
text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

name: Summoning Portal
text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavorText: NOT LESS THAN 1! Don't get any ideas!

name: Voidcaller
text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
flavorText: "Void! Here, void! Here, buddy!"

name: Fel Cannon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
flavorText: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

name: Imp-losion
text: Deal 2- 4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
flavorText: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

name: Dreadsteed
text: Deathrattle: At the end of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
flavorText: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament. Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

name: Fist of Jaraxxus
text: When you play or discard this, deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

name: Blastcrystal Potion
text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
flavorText: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

name: Crystalweaver
text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
flavorText: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

name: Seadevil Stinger
text: Battlecry: The next Murloc you play this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

name: Bloodbloom
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: Help save mana. Donate blood today!

name: Lakkari Felhound
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavorText: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Ravenous Pterrordax
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt twice.
flavorText: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

name: Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal 5 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)

name: Cataclysm
text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
flavorText: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

name: Greater Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal 7 damage to a minion.

name: Hooked Reaver
text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
flavorText: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavorText: A purple stone Azari carved For dark hearts, craving, power-starved. The first to bow, the warlock Rin, Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Blood Witch
text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

name: Fiendish Circle
text: Summon four 1/1 Imps.
flavorText: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

name: High Priestess Jeklik
text: Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavorText: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

name: Eager Underling
text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavorText: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Diseased Vulture
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavorText: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

name: Impbalming
text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
flavorText: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

name: Fiendish Rites
text: Invoke Galakrond. Give your minions +1 Attack.
flavorText: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

name: Veiled Worshipper
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, draw 3 cards.
flavorText: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

name: Nightshade Matron
text: Rush Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
flavorText: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

name: The Dark Portal
text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavorText: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: Crystalweaver
text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +2/+2.

name: Cascading Disaster
text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Corrupt: Destroy 2. Corrupt Again: Destroy 3.
flavorText: Please keep all hands, arms, feet and legs inside the ride until the monster comes to a complete stop.

name: Cascading Disaster
text: Corrupted Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Corrupt: Destroy 3.

name: Cascading Disaster
text: Corrupted Destroy 3 random enemy minions.

name: Fire Breather
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavorText: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

name: Fiendish Circle
text: Summon four 1/1 Imps.
flavorText: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

name: Hellfire
text: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters.
flavorText: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Lakkari Felhound
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your two lowest-Cost cards.
flavorText: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Bane of Doom
text: Deal 2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavorText: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Doomguard
text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavorText: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Demonheart
text: Deal 5 damage to a minion. If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
flavorText: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

name: Floating Watcher
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

name: Usher of Souls
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavorText: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

name: Kara Kazham!
text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
flavorText: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.

name: Feeding Time
text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
flavorText: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

name: Nether Portal
text: Open a permanent portal that summons 3/2 Imps.

name: Tar Lurker
text: Taunt Has +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavorText: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
text: Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
flavorText: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

name: Despicable Dreadlord
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: He's deathspicable.

name: Skull of the Man'ari
text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
flavorText: Don't trust the skull.

name: The Final Seal
text: Summon a 6/6 Demon. Add 'Azari, the Devourer' to your hand.

name: The First Seal
text: Summon a 2/2 Demon. Add 'The Second Seal' to your hand.

name: The Fourth Seal
text: Summon a 5/5 Demon. Add 'The Final Seal' to your hand.

name: The Second Seal
text: Summon a 3/3 Demon. Add 'The Third Seal' to your hand.

name: The Third Seal
text: Summon a 4/4 Demon. Add 'The Fourth Seal' to your hand.

name: Deathweb Spider
text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
flavorText: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

name: Omega Agent
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, summon 2 copies of this minion.
flavorText: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
flavorText: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

name: Crazed Netherwing
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavorText: Always tail swipes left.

name: Desperate Dreadlord
text: Lifesteal

name: Void Drinker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to gain +3/+3.
flavorText: It has no taste.

name: Floating Watcher
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +4/+4.

name: Envoy Rustwix
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 random Prime Legendary minions into your deck.
flavorText: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

name: Felsoul Jailer
text: Battlecry: Your opponent discards a minion. Deathrattle: Return it.
flavorText: He can lock 'em up, but he just can't keep 'em.

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Anima Golem
text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
flavorText: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

name: Dark Bargain
text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
flavorText: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

name: Void Crusher
text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
flavorText: We like to call him "Wesley".

name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
flavorText: He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*. *He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

name: Felfire Potion
text: Deal 5 damage to all characters.
flavorText: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

name: Kabal Trafficker
text: At the end of your turn, add a random Demon to your hand.
flavorText: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

name: Cruel Dinomancer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion you discarded this game.
flavorText: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

name: Possessed Lackey
text: Deathrattle: Recruit a Demon.
flavorText: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

name: Rin, the First Disciple
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
flavorText: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

name: Glinda Crowskin
text: Minions in your hand have Echo.
flavorText: Summon an unlimited* number of minions!** *Six **Wisps

name: Dr. Morrigan
text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
flavorText: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

name: Ectomancy
text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
flavorText: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

name: Soulwarden
text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.
flavorText: Reduce, reuse, resoul.

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: Taunt When you draw this, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Darkest Hour
text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavorText: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Riftcleaver
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
flavorText: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

name: Abyssal Summoner
text: Battlecry: Summon a Demon with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavorText: But gnomes have tiny hands...

name: Hand of Gul'dan
text: When you play or discard this, draw 3 cards.
flavorText: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

name: Keli'dan the Breaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
flavorText: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

name: Deck of Chaos
text: Swap the Cost and Attack of all minions in your deck.
flavorText: Yeah, it's chaos, but it's organized chaos.

name: Ring Matron
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Imps.
flavorText: But where does she keep them?

name: Tickatus
text: Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavorText: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Tickatus
text: Corrupted Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your opponent's deck.

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt Your other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

name: Fearsome Doomguard
flavorText: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

name: Cho'gall
text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

name: Abyssal Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavorText: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

name: Lord Godfrey
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions. If any die, repeat this Battlecry.
flavorText: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

name: Blood Troll Sapper
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavorText: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Galakrond, Azeroth's End
text: Battlecry: Summon 4 random Demons. Equip a 5/2 Claw.

name: Galakrond, the Apocalypse
text: Battlecry: Summon 2 random Demons. ( )

name: Galakrond, the Wretched
text: Battlecry: Summon 1 random Demon. ( )
flavorText: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

name: Valdris Felgorge
text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
flavorText: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

name: Soulciologist Malicia
text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush. ( )
flavorText: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt Your other Demons have +2 Attack.

name: Enslaved Fel Lord
text: Taunt. Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: He's not really chained up. He just wears that to scare the imps when they get too unruly.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Demonbolt
text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
flavorText: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

name: Hir'eek, the Bat
text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.
flavorText: REPEL’S EFFECT WORE OFF.

name: Void Contract
text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
flavorText: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

name: Fel Lord Betrug
text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
flavorText: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Zzeraku the Warped
text: Whenever your hero takes damage, summon a 6/6 Nether Drake.
flavorText: The extra Z is for "zesty."

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavorText: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Kanrethad Prime
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 friendly Demons that died this game.

name: Archwitch Willow
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
flavorText: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

name: Imp Mama
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a random Demon and give it Taunt.

name: Imp Mama
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon 2 random Demons and give them Taunt.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
flavorText: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Mal'Ganis
text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.
flavorText: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

name: Krul the Unshackled
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon all Demons from your hand.
flavorText: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

name: Voidlord
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon three 1/3 Demons with Taunt.
flavorText: Never let it hold your checkbook.

name: Mal'Ganis
text: Your other Demons have +4/+4. Your hero is Immune.

name: Voidlord
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon three 2/6 Demons with Taunt.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.
flavorText: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: DOOM!
text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
flavorText: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that died this game.
flavorText: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

name: Azari, the Devourer
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's deck.

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavorText: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: Nether Portal
text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/2 Imps.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Bold Determination
text: Hero Power Give your lowest Health minion +1/+2.

name: Charge
text: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
flavorText: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavorText: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavorText: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavorText: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Warbot
text: Has +1 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

name: Cursed Blade
text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
flavorText: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.

name: Scarab
text: Taunt

name: Blood To Ichor
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavorText: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

name: N'Zoth's First Mate
text: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
flavorText: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

name: Pawn
text: Taunt

name: I Know a Guy
text: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavorText: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

name: Choose Your Path
text: Discover a card.

name: Fire Plume's Heart
text: Quest: Play 7 Taunt minions. Reward: Sulfuras.
flavorText: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

name: Iron Hide
text: Gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

name: Molten Blade
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
flavorText: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

name: Animated Berserker
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavorText: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

name: Town Crier
text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavorText: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

name: Eternium Rover
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2 Armor.
flavorText: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

name: Omega Assembly
text: Discover a Mech. If you have 10 Mana Crystals, keep all 3 cards.
flavorText: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

name: Devastate
text: Deal 4 damage to a damaged minion.
flavorText: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

name: Spirit of the Rhino
text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
flavorText: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

name: Improve Morale
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: Hack the System
text: Quest: Attack 5 times with your hero. Reward: Anraphet's Core.
flavorText: Anything can be hacked, if you're holding an axe.

name: Into the Fray
text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Sky Raider
text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
flavorText: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

name: Boom Squad
text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
flavorText: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

name: Risky Skipper
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, equip a 3/2 Axe.
flavorText: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

name: Sword and Board
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
flavorText: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

name: Athletic Studies
text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavorText: It's a quick read.

name: Spiked Wheel
text: Has +3 Attack while your hero has Armor.
flavorText: Great for driving, terrible for steering.

name: Stage Dive
text: Draw a Rush minion. Corrupt: Give it +2/+1.
flavorText: The most metal trust fall.

name: Stage Dive
text: Corrupted Draw a Rush minion and give it +2/+1.

name: Bloodsail Deckhand
text: Battlecry: The next weapon you play costs (1) less.
flavorText: Piracy is technically a discount.

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavorText: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavorText: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Armor Up!
text: Hero Power Gain 2 Armor.

name: Armor Up!
text: Hero Power Gain 2 Armor.

name: Cleave
text: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavorText: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavorText: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Heroic Strike
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

name: Tank Up!
text: Hero Power Gain 4 Armor.

name: Armorsmith
text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavorText: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Battle Rage
text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
flavorText: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

name: Commanding Shout
text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
flavorText: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

name: Cruel Taskmaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Rampage
text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavorText: Minion get ANGRY. Minion SMASH!

name: Slam
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavorText: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Revenge
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 3 damage instead.
flavorText: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.

name: Alexstrasza's Champion
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
flavorText: "Put more spikes on her. No, more spikes. What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand? MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

name: Bolster
text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
flavorText: The best offense is a good defense.

name: Sparring Partner
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give a minion Taunt.
flavorText: Come at me, bro.

name: Hobart Grapplehammer
text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
flavorText: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

name: Public Defender
text: Taunt
flavorText: Happy to defend any public offender!

name: Sleep with the Fishes
text: Deal 3 damage to all damaged minions.
flavorText: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

name: Stolen Goods
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
flavorText: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

name: Cornered Sentry
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your opponent.
flavorText: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

name: Explore Un'Goro
text: Replace your deck with copies of "Discover a card."
flavorText: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

name: Bladestorm
text: Hero Power Deal 1 damage to all minions.

name: Bring It On!
text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
flavorText: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

name: Dead Man's Hand
text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
flavorText: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

name: Forge of Souls
text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
flavorText: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

name: Bladed Gauntlet
text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
flavorText: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

name: Drywhisker Armorer
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
flavorText: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

name: Redband Wasp
text: Rush Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

name: Warpath
text: Echo Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

name: Woodcutter's Axe
text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly Rush minion.
flavorText: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

name: Big Red Button
text: Hero Power Activate this turn's Mech Suit power!

name: Blast Shield
text: Hero Power Gain 7 Armor. Swaps each turn.

name: Delivery Drone
text: Hero Power Discover a Mech. Swaps each turn.

name: Guard Bot
text: Taunt

name: KABOOM!
text: Hero Power Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Swaps each turn.

name: Micro-Squad
text: Hero Power Summon three 1/1 Microbots. Swaps each turn.

name: Rocket Boots
text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
flavorText: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

name: Weapons Project
text: Each player equips a 2/3 weapon and gains 6 Armor.
flavorText: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

name: Zap Cannon
text: Hero Power Deal 3 damage. Swaps each turn.

name: Dragon Roar
text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
flavorText: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

name: Sweeping Strikes
text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
flavorText: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

name: Vicious Scraphound
text: Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavorText: It begs for scraps.

name: Anraphet's Core
text: Hero Power Summon a 4/3 Golem. After your hero attacks, refresh this.

name: Frightened Flunky
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavorText: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Galakrond's Might
text: Hero Power Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.

name: Ritual Chopper
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: Chop chop, Galakrond!

name: Corsair Cache
text: Draw a weapon. Give it +1 Durability.
flavorText: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

name: In Formation!
text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
flavorText: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

name: Bumper Car
text: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Riders with Rush to your hand.
flavorText: Subject: Re: Unsafe Rides? bump

name: E.T.C., God of Metal
text: After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: There are Old Gods and then there are Rock Gods.

name: Minefield
text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions.
flavorText: Dodge bombs like you're playing Tonksweeper!

name: Ringmaster's Baton
text: After your hero attacks, give a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: A mech, a dragon, and a pirate walk into an Old God's gaping maw. The mech was too crunchy, the dragon was too hot, but the pirate was just right.

name: Stage Hand
text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Holds everything himself because people wouldn't stop touching the prop table.

name: Armorsmith
text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavorText: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Cruel Taskmaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavorText: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Slam
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavorText: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Blazing Longsword
text: Also damages minions next to whomever your hero attacks.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavorText: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Shield Block
text: Gain 5 Armor. Draw a card.
flavorText: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Warsong Commander
text: Your Charge minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Bouncing Blade
text: Deal 1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
flavorText: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

name: Ogre Warmaul
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

name: Bash
text: Deal 3 damage. Gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice. It doesn't.

name: King's Defender
text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
flavorText: "King's Attacker" is a shield. Funny, huh?

name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavorText: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

name: Fierce Monkey
text: Taunt
flavorText: Fierce monkey. That funky monkey.

name: Blood Warriors
text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
flavorText: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

name: Bloodsail Cultist
text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavorText: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

name: Ravaging Ghoul
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

name: Protect the King!
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
flavorText: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!

name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
text: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

name: Sulfuras
text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 8 damage to a random enemy.'

name: Mountainfire Armor
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, gain 6 Armor.
flavorText: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavorText: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

name: Kobold Barbarian
text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
flavorText: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

name: Reckless Flurry
text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
flavorText: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: Rabid Worgen
text: Rush
flavorText: "I'm sorry, son. We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

name: Overlord's Whip
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavorText: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

name: Smolderthorn Lancer
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavorText: Here comes “The Smolder.”

name: Clockwork Goblin
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavorText: They always wind up bombing.

name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
text: Battlecry: Choose a damaged friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
flavorText: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

name: Livewire Lance
text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

name: Ancharrr
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your deck.
flavorText: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

name: Awaken!
text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

name: EVIL Quartermaster
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

name: Ramming Speed
text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
flavorText: Her deductible keeps going up.

name: Skybarge
text: After you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

name: Bomb Wrangler
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Boom Bot.
flavorText: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

name: Bladestorm
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
flavorText: Dear minions: Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh. Best regards, Bladestorm

name: Bonechewer Raider
text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavorText: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
text: Whenever your hero would take damage, this loses 1 Durability instead.
flavorText: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

name: Warmaul Challenger
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Battle it to the death!
flavorText: Old gladiator rules: first one to die loses.

name: Playmaker
text: After you play a Rush minion, summon a copy with 1 Health remaining.
flavorText: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

name: Feat of Strength
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavorText: Generally happens right after the airing of grievances.

name: Ironclad
text: Battlecry: If your hero has Armor, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: With one inch of clearance, Ironclad proved ineffective against speedbumps.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavorText: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: War Cache
text: Add a random Warrior minion, spell, and weapon to your hand.
flavorText: It's much tidier than Illidan's storage locker.

name: Warsong Commander
text: After you summon another minion, give it Rush.
flavorText: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Kor'kron Elite
text: Charge
flavorText: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Arathi Weaponsmith
text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
flavorText: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

name: Mortal Strike
text: Deal 4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 6 instead.
flavorText: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

name: Death's Bite
text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord

name: Screwjank Clunker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavorText: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

name: Axe Flinger
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".

name: Magnataur Alpha
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever he attacks.
flavorText: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

name: Bloodhoof Brave
text: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it. He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

name: Brass Knuckles
text: After your hero attacks, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

name: Grimy Gadgeteer
text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

name: Blood Razor
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

name: Militia Commander
text: Rush Battlecry: Gain +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

name: War Master Voone
text: Battlecry: Copy all Dragons in your hand.
flavorText: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
text: Gain 1 Armor. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavorText: “We did it! We blew up the vault!” “You mean the vault door?” “Oh. The doooor…”

name: Omega Devastator
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, deal 10 damage to a minion.
flavorText: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Restless Mummy
text: Rush Reborn
flavorText: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

name: Molten Breath
text: Deal 5 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

name: Scion of Ruin
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2 copies of this.
flavorText: Ruined! RUINED!

name: Kargath Bladefist
text: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Bloodhoof Brave
text: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it. He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

name: Reaper's Scythe
text: Spellburst: Also damages adjacent minions this turn.
flavorText: Die. Die. Die.

name: Screwjank Clunker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4/+4.

name: Sword Eater
text: Taunt Battlecry: Equip a 3/2 Sword.
flavorText: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

name: Warsong Outrider
text: Rush
flavorText: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into them while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Arcanite Reaper
flavorText: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavorText: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Siege Engine
text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.
flavorText: Wintergrasp Keep's only weakness!

name: Tentacles for Arms
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
flavorText: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

name: Fool's Bane
text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
flavorText: A fool and his bane are soon parted.

name: Ironforge Portal
text: Gain 4 Armor. Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavorText: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

name: Alley Armorsmith
text: Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavorText: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

name: Direhorn Hatchling
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
flavorText: His mom could beat up your mom.

name: Direhorn Matriarch
text: Taunt

name: Sudden Genesis
text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
flavorText: Being hurt can make you another person.

name: Death Revenant
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.

name: Wolfrider

name: Demolisher

text: Stealth

text: Charge

name: Fire Hawk

name: Goboglide Tech
