flavorText: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

name: Wicked Skeleton
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion that died this turn.
flavorText: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

name: Cursed Disciple
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
flavorText: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

name: Darkness Candle
text: Casts When Drawn Snuff out a candle.

name: Ebon Dragonsmith
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
flavorText: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

name: Hoarding Dragon
text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
flavorText: Keeps his two cents to himself.

name: Kobold Monk
text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: There is no candle.

name: Shimmering Courser
text: Only you can target this with spells and Hero Powers.
flavorText: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

name: Shroom Brewer
text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health.
flavorText: Side effects guaranteed!

name: Sneaky Devil
text: Stealth Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

name: The Darkness
text: Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
flavorText: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

name: Felsoul Inquisitor
text: Lifesteal Taunt
flavorText: Everyone expects an inquisition reference.

name: Lifedrinker
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Mad Hatter
text: Battlecry: Randomly toss 3 hats to other minions. Each hat gives +1/+1.
flavorText: He's entirely bonkers. All the best goblins are.

name: Night Prowler
text: Battlecry: If this is the only minion on the battlefield, gain +3/+3.
flavorText: Listen to the mew-sic of the night.

name: Royal Gift
text: Give a minion +2/+2 for each minion you control.

name: Sandbinder
text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental from your deck.
flavorText: The secret is glue.

name: Scaleworm
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
flavorText: A popular local alternative to bananas.

name: Swift Messenger
text: Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
flavorText: Same turn delivery - guaranteed!

name: Swift Messenger
text: Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.

name: Unpowered Steambot
text: Taunt
flavorText: Overpowered Steambot got nerfed.

name: Witchwood Piper
text: Battlecry: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck.
flavorText: She rids villages of annoying pests, like rats and children.

name: Coppertail Imposter
text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
flavorText: It was fitting in fine until it gathered nuts and bolts.

name: Explodinator
text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
flavorText: When it absolutely, positively, has to blow up overnight.

name: Harbinger Celestia
text: Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, become a copy of it.
flavorText: She wanders realities, taking on many forms. One was a unicorn princess.

name: Omega Defender
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +10 Attack.
flavorText: "Surrender. You have 10 mana to comply."

name: Piloted Reaper
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from your hand that costs (2) or less.
flavorText: New facial recognition systems keep out the Lorewalkers and Doomsayers.

name: Replicating Menace
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
flavorText: It's a car! *Whomp whomp whomp* It's a robot! *Whomp whom-CRUNCH* It's… three.. smaller robots!

name: Steel Rager
text: Rush
flavorText: Rage alongside the machine.

name: Weaponized Piñata
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavorText: It'll be fine. It's not like they have any reason to hate us.

name: Whizbang the Wonderful
text: You start the game with one of Whizbang's Wonderful Decks!
flavorText: From the prestigious Westfall Wonderfuls.

name: Arena Fanatic
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Her fantasy Rumble league gives double points for dismemberment.

name: Arena Treasure Chest
text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Yeah it's great, but did you see the Arena Treasure Arms?!

name: Griftah
text: Battlecry: Discover two cards. Give one to your opponent at random.
flavorText: With Griftah in your deck, sometimes you start the game with The Coin!

name: Half-Time Scavenger
text: Stealth Overkill: Gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: One player's trash is another's “Best In Slot”.

name: Ice Cream Peddler
text: Battlecry: If you control a Frozen minion, gain 8 Armor.
flavorText: I scream, you scream, we all scream when we see a Freeze Mage.

name: Murloc Tastyfin
text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
flavorText: He was destined for the soup. One way or another…

name: Regeneratin' Thug
text: At the start of your turn, restore 2 Health to this minion.
flavorText: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

name: Rumbletusk Shaker
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Rumbletusk Breaker.
flavorText: Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub. And who do you think dey be? Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah. And all of dem comin' for me.

name: Ticket Scalper
text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Takes ten percent off the top.

name: Archmage Vargoth
text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell you've cast this turn (targets are random).
flavorText: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

name: Continuum Collider
text: Take an extra turn. Your opponent takes an extra turn after.

name: Hecklebot
text: Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
flavorText: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

name: Hench-Clan Hag
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
flavorText: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

name: Portal Keeper
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavorText: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Proud Defender
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack while you have no other minions.
flavorText: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
flavorText: His allies call him invaluable.

name: Traveling Healer
text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Violet Spellsword
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

name: Blade of the Burning Sun
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your deck +2 Attack. Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.

name: Body Wrapper
text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
flavorText: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

name: Bone Wraith
text: Taunt Reborn
flavorText: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

name: Conjured Mirage
text: Taunt At the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
flavorText: What you see is Isiset.

name: Sunstruck Henchman
text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to fall asleep.
flavorText: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

name: Bad Luck Albatross
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

name: Devoted Maniac
text: Rush Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

name: Dragonmaw Poacher
text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
flavorText: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

name: Evasive Feywing
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

name: Frizz Kindleroost
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by (2).
flavorText: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

name: Hippogryph
text: Rush Taunt
flavorText: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

name: Hoard Pillager
text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
flavorText: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

name: Troll Batrider
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

name: Wing Commander
text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
flavorText: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
flavorText: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

name: Escaped Manasaber
text: Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

name: Frenzied Felwing
text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
flavorText: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

name: Grand Lackey Erkh
text: After you play a Lackey, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: Esteemed leader of Rafaam's Inhuman Resources department.

name: Sharkbait
text: Rush

name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you've played a Quest this game, summon a 4/2 Parrot with Rush.
flavorText: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

name: Burrowing Scorpid
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If that kills the target, gain Stealth.
flavorText: It's a game of hide and go sting.

name: Demonic Portal
text: Each turn, summons Unstable Energy. Destroy 30 to stabilize the portal and win! ( left!)

name: Disguised Wanderer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
flavorText: He wanders east... always into the east.

name: Felfin Navigator
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
flavorText: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

name: Fiery Unstable Energy
text: Can't attack. At the end of each turn, deal 3 damage to both heroes.

name: Handmaiden Vashj
text: Spell Damage +1 Your spells cost (1) less.

name: Magtheridon
text: Dormant. Battlecry: Summon three 1/3 enemy Warders. When they die, destroy all minions and awaken.
flavorText: Came from another world to invade Outland and bend it to his will… only to be overthrown by an elf from another world who invaded Outland and bent it to his will.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavorText: Go directly to Demon Jail. Do not attack minions, do not collect mana crystals.

name: Ravencrest Lancer
text: Rush

name: Replicat-o-tron
text: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
flavorText: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

name: Rustsworn Cultist
text: Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Demon."
flavorText: "Rust… I love it. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere."

name: Crimson Hothead
text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: Has a real passion for spelling.

name: Divine Rager
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

name: Fishy Flyer
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a 4/3 Ghost with Rush to your hand.
flavorText: Like a fish out of water.

name: Potion of Illusion
text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavorText: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Spectral Flyer
text: Rush

name: Steeldancer
text: Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your weapon's Attack.
flavorText: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

name: Wretched Tutor
text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

name: Baron Rivendare
text: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles three times.

name: Bloodsail Cannoneer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Pirates +3 Attack.

name: Bloodsail Cannoneer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Pirates +6 Attack.

name: Bronze Warden
text: Divine Shield Reborn

name: Bronze Warden
text: Divine Shield Reborn

name: Champion of Y'Shaarj
text: Whenever a friendly Taunt minion is attacked, gain +1/+1 permanently.

name: Champion of Y'Shaarj
text: Whenever a friendly Taunt minion is attacked, gain +2/+2 permanently.

name: Crackling Cyclone
text: Divine Shield Windfury

name: Crackling Cyclone
text: Divine Shield Mega-Windfury

name: Crowd Favorite
text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +2/+2.

name: Deadly Spore
text: Poisonous

name: Deadly Spore
text: Poisonous

name: Defender of Argus
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2 and Taunt.

name: Deflect-o-Bot
text: Divine Shield Whenever you summon a Mech during combat, gain +1 Attack and Divine Shield.

name: Deflect-o-Bot
text: Divine Shield Whenever you summon a Mech during combat, gain +2 Attack and Divine Shield.

name: Faceless Taverngoer
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion in Bob's Tavern. Transform into a plain copy of it.

name: Faceless Taverngoer
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion in Bob's Tavern. Transform into a Golden copy of it.

name: Felfin Navigator
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2/+2.

name: Gentle Megasaur
text: Battlecry: Adapt your Murlocs.

name: Gentle Megasaur
text: Battlecry: Adapt your Murlocs twice.

name: Lil' Rag
text: After you play an Elemental, give a friendly minion stats equal to the Elemental's Tavern Tier.

name: Lil' Rag
text: After you play an Elemental, give a friendly minion stats equal to the Elemental's Tavern Tier twice.

name: Old Murk-Eye
text: Charge. Has +2 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.

name: Party Elemental
text: After you play an Elemental, give another random friendly Elemental +1/+1.

name: Party Elemental
text: After you play an Elemental, give another random friendly Elemental +1/+1 twice.

name: Piloted Shredder
text: Deathrattle: Summon two random 2-Cost minions.

name: Piloted Shredder
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.

name: Replicating Menace
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 2/2 Microbots.

name: Ripsnarl Captain
text: Whenever another friendly Pirate attacks, give it +2/+2.

name: Ripsnarl Captain
text: Whenever another friendly Pirate attacks, give it +4/+4.

name: Soul Devourer
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Demon. Remove it to gain its stats and 3 Gold.

name: Soul Devourer
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Demon. Remove it to gain double its stats and 6 Gold.

name: Stasis Elemental
text: Battlecry: Add another random Elemental to Bob's Tavern and Freeze it.

name: Stasis Elemental
text: Battlecry: Add two other random Elementals to Bob's Tavern and Freeze them.

name: Steward of Time
text: When you sell this minion, give all minions in Bob's Tavern +1/+1.

name: Steward of Time
text: When you sell this minion, give all minions in Bob's Tavern +2/+2.

name: Warden of Old
text: Deathrattle: Add a Gold Coin to your hand.

name: Warden of Old
text: Deathrattle: Add 2 Gold Coins to your hand.

name: Ancient Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.

name: Barricade
text: Summon a 2/4 Guard with Taunt. If it's your only minion, summon another.
flavorText: The Alliance and Horde join forces to enforce the fire safety capacity.

name: Circus Amalgam
text: Taunt This has all minion types.
flavorText: Who needs a petting zoo when you have all the creatures right here?!

name: Circus Medic
text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health. Corrupt: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavorText: Just be careful not to mix this with any creepy eyeballs, tentacles, or dark whispers, and you'll be fine in the morning.

name: Circus Medic
text: Corrupted Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.

name: Fantastic Firebird
text: Windfury
flavorText: The original flaming chicken.

name: Knife Vendor
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavorText: "They're perfectly safe! These gloves totally aren't hiding any bandages."

name: Rally!
text: Resurrect a friendly 1-Cost, 2-Cost, and 3-Cost minion.
flavorText: One for the squire, two for the gnome, three for the glory, and GO, GO, GO!

name: Shalamayne
text: After you attack, give +1/+1 to your legendary minions.

name: Shalamayne
text: After you attack, give +1/+1 to your minions with Rush.

name: Blademaster Samuro
text: Rush Frenzy: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack  to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.

name: Spirit Healer
text: After you cast a Holy spell, give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
flavorText: "You again? What did I tell you about trying to fight ALL the quilboars."

name: Baron Rivendare
text: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles twice.
flavorText: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

name: Big Game Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavorText: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him. Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Chillwind Yeti
flavorText: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore. Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

name: Defender of Argus
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavorText: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending. But it does.

name: Grim Necromancer
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
flavorText: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

name: SI:7 Infiltrator
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy Secret.
flavorText: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
text: Taunt
flavorText: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavorText: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
text: Taunt
flavorText: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

name: Darkscale Healer
text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: Healing is just something she does in her free time. It's more of a hobby really.

name: Frostwolf Warlord
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley. Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

name: Gurubashi Berserker
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
flavorText: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Nightblade
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

name: Stormpike Commando
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts. They also bake a mean cupcake.

name: Abomination
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
flavorText: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

name: Big Game Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavorText: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him. Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Captain Greenskin
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
flavorText: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

name: Faceless Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavorText: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

name: Fen Creeper
text: Taunt
flavorText: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast. Boom, New Name!

name: Harrison Jones
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
flavorText: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

name: Silver Hand Knight
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Squire.
flavorText: It's good to be a knight. Less so to be one's squire.

name: Spiteful Smith
text: Your weapon has +2 Attack while this is damaged.
flavorText: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

name: Stampeding Kodo
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth
flavorText: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavorText: No Job is too big. No fee is too big.

name: Azure Drake
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
flavorText: He's looking for a drummer. The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavorText: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Feugen
text: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
flavorText: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.

name: Frozen Champion
text: Permanently Frozen. Adjacent minions are Immune to Frost Breath.

name: Loatheb
text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
flavorText: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast. This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

name: Mark of the Horsemen
text: Give your minions and your weapon +1/+1.

name: Pure Cold
text: Deal 8 damage to the enemy hero, and Freeze it.

name: Sludge Belcher
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Slime with Taunt.
flavorText: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

name: Spectral Knight
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common? They both love pasta!

name: Spectral Rider
text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your hero.

name: Stalagg
text: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
flavorText: Stalagg want to write own flavor text. "STALAGG AWESOME!"

name: Unholy Shadow
text: Hero Power Draw 2 cards.

name: Antique Healbot
text: Battlecry: Restore 8 Health to your hero.
flavorText: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)

name: Blingtron 3000
text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon for each player.
flavorText: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.

name: Bomb Lobber
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

name: Fel Reaver
text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: So reaver. Much fel. Wow.

name: Hemet Nesingwary
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast.
flavorText: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

name: Junkbot
text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

name: Madder Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavorText: Dang, Bomber, calm down.

name: Mimiron's Head
text: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 3 Mechs, destroy them all and form V-07-TR-0N.
flavorText: Do not push the big red button!

name: Salty Dog
flavorText: He's recently recovered from being a "scurvy dog."

name: Blackwing Corruptor
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
flavorText: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.

name: Grim Patron
text: After this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
flavorText: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

name: Clockwork Knight
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
flavorText: It takes a lot to wind him up.

name: Kvaldir Raider
text: Inspire: Gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

name: Mukla's Champion
text: Inspire: Give your other minions +1/+1.
flavorText: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
flavorText: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion. Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

name: Pit Fighter
flavorText: What did the pits ever do to you?

name: Recruiter
text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
flavorText: Join the Argent Crusade! We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

name: Anubisath Sentinel
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3/+3.
flavorText: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.

name: Djinni of Zephyrs
text: After you cast a spell on another friendly minion, cast a copy of it on this one.
flavorText: If you want your wish granted, don't rub him the wrong way.

name: Summoning Stone
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
flavorText: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.

name: Corrupted Healbot
text: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

name: Crazed Worshipper
text: Taunt. Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavorText: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

name: Cult Apothecary
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Cults need pharmacists too.

name: Darkspeaker
text: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
flavorText: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

name: Psych-o-Tron
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

name: Validated Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
flavorText: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

name: Avian Watcher
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavorText: He mostly watches light romantic comedies.

name: Barnes
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of a random minion in your deck.
flavorText: He used to play every part, until Moroes confiscated his Orb of Deception.

name: Menagerie Magician
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +2/+2.
flavorText: Just between us, if things get tight the Menagerie Magician position will probably be the first to go.

name: Prince Malchezaar
text: Start of Game: Add 5 extra Legendary minions to your deck.
flavorText: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale! Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.

name: Tossing Plates
text: Summon five 1/1 Plates.

name: Bomb Squad
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Please don't explode! Please don't explode! Please don't explode!

name: Burgly Bully
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a Coin to your hand.
flavorText: He only burgles to pay the bills. He is really just a bully at heart.

name: Doppelgangster
text: Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this minion.
flavorText: "Every me, get in here!"

name: Doppelgangster
text: Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this minion.

name: Doppelgangster
text: Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this minion.

name: Felbloom
text: Deal 4 damage to all minions.

name: Finja, the Flying Star
text: Stealth Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, summon 2 Murlocs from your deck.
flavorText: The last true master of Finjitsu.

name: Goldthorn
text: Give your minions +4 Health.

name: Greater Potion
text: Create a 5-Cost spell.

name: Grook Fu Master
text: Windfury
flavorText: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

name: Heart of Fire
text: Deal 5 damage.

name: Icecap
text: Freeze 2 random enemy minions.

name: Ichor of Undeath
text: Summon 2 friendly minions that died this game.

name: Kingsblood
text: Draw 2 cards.

name: Lotus Agents
text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
flavorText: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

name: Mystic Wool
text: Transform a random enemy minion into a 1/1 Sheep. Polymorph a random enemy minion.

name: Netherbloom
text: Summon a 5/5 Demon.

name: Red Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: It has double the Attack. "Go on." And double the Health. "Yes??" And its trigger has twice the effect. "WHAT???" And it costs… Five times more.

name: Second-Rate Bruiser
text: Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
flavorText: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

name: Shadow Oil
text: Add 2 random Demons to your hand.

name: Spiked Hogrider
text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain Charge.
flavorText: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway? They do. It's a real group.

name: Stonescale Oil
text: Gain 7 Armor.

name: Streetwise Investigator
text: Battlecry: Enemy minions lose Stealth.
flavorText: "Hmmmm… Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

name: Bittertide Hydra
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

name: Elise the Trailblazer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed Un'Goro pack into your deck.
flavorText: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

name: Nesting Roc
text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
flavorText: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

name: Servant of Kalimos
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Discover an Elemental.
flavorText: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

name: Bloodworm
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

name: Cobalt Scalebane
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavorText: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

name: Corpse Raiser
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavorText: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

name: Skelemancer
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
flavorText: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

name: Sunborne Val'kyr
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
flavorText: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

name: Tomb Lurker
text: Battlecry: Add a random Deathrattle minion that died this game to your hand.
flavorText: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

name: Venomancer
text: Poisonous
flavorText: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

name: Arcane Tyrant
text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavorText: Tyrant is such a strong word.

name: Carnivorous Cube
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
flavorText: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

name: Corrosive Sludge
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

name: Fungalmancer
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
flavorText: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

name: Furbolg Mossbinder
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6 Elemental.
flavorText: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

name: Green Jelly
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with Taunt.
flavorText: This card really breaks out of the mold.

name: Guild Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
flavorText: The original telemarketer.

name: King's Ransom
text: Swap decks with your opponent.

name: Trogg Gloomeater
text: Taunt Poisonous
flavorText: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

name: Chief Inspector
text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets.
flavorText: Empty your pockets, I know you’ve got a Wandering Monster in there!

name: Clockwork Automaton
text: Double the damage and healing of your Hero Power.
flavorText: Most mechs are pretty chill, but this one is all wound up.

name: Dollmaster Dorian
text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavorText: The children were puzzled by the scratches covering the insides of their toy-boxes.

name: Muck Hunter
text: Rush Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Mucklings for your opponent.
flavorText: You think your job mucks.

name: Rotten Applebaum
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Key ingredient in Gilnean applesauce.

name: Witchwood Grizzly
text: Taunt Battlecry: Lose 1 Health for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavorText: You know what they say about people with big hands? Small bears.

name: Bomb
text: Casts When Drawn You take 5 damage.

name: E.M.P. Operative
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mech.
flavorText: "I said this looks like a job for me So everybody just follow me 'Cause we need a little E.M.P. 'Cause it feels so mechy without me…"

name: Holomancer
text: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavorText: Help me, worthy opponent. You're my only hope.

name: Loose Specimen
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among other friendly minions.
flavorText: You leave Deathstalker Rexxar alone in the lab for TWO minutes…

name: Rusty Recycler
text: Taunt Lifesteal
flavorText: Ironic. It could recycle others, but not itself.

name: Seaforium Bomber
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavorText: Dress for the bomb you want, not the bomb you have.

name: Subject 9
text: Battlecry: Draw 5 different Secrets from your deck.
flavorText: The original clever girl.

name: Wargear
text: Magnetic
flavorText: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

name: Zilliax
text: Magnetic Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Rush
flavorText: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.

name: Arena Patron
text: Overkill: Summon another Arena Patron.
flavorText: Everybody with a ticket get in here!

name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Caution: Contains Flammable Material

name: Former Champ
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Hotshot.
flavorText: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

name: Mosh'Ogg Announcer
text: Enemies attacking this have a 50% chance to attack someone else.
flavorText: One's play-by-play. The other is off-color.

name: Sightless Ranger
text: Rush Overkill: Summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavorText: An eye for sore sights.

name: Snapjaw Shellfighter
text: Whenever an adjacent minion takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
flavorText: Nonono, the turtle is the Shellfighter.

name: Azerite Elemental
text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
flavorText: This is some bad blood.

name: Barista Lynchen
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions to your hand.
flavorText: "Thanks a latte!"

name: Dalaran Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

name: Gnomish Army Knife
text: Give a minion Charge, Windfury, Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Poisonous, Taunt, and Stealth.

name: Recurring Villain
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavorText: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Sow the Seeds
text: Give all minions in your deck +3/+3.

name: Sunreaver Warmage
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

name: Super Simian Sphere
text: Summon King Mukla. Give it Immune and 'Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.'

name: Advanced Targeting Monocle
text: Cast a copy of all spells in your deck (targets chosen randomly).

name: Desert Obelisk
text: If you control 3 of these at the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

name: Faceless Lurker
text: Taunt Battlecry: Double this minion's Health.
flavorText: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

name: Mortuary Machine
text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
flavorText: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

name: Phalanx Commander
text: Your Taunt minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

name: Staff of Scales
text: Summon three 1/1 Snakes with Rush, Poisonous and Reborn.

name: Wasteland Assassin
text: Stealth Reborn
flavorText: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

name: Big Ol' Whelp
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

name: Chromatic Egg
text: Battlecry: Secretly Discover a Dragon to hatch into. Deathrattle: Hatch!
flavorText: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

name: Cobalt Spellkin
text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to your hand.
flavorText: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

name: Faceless Corruptor
text: Rush. Battlecry: Transform one of your minions into a copy of this.
flavorText: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

name: Kobold Stickyfinger
text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: He no take candle. He take sword.

name: Platebreaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
flavorText: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

name: Shield of Galakrond
text: Taunt Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

name: Skyfin
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
flavorText: "Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" "Yes."

name: Tentacled Menace
text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their Costs.
flavorText: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

name: Boompistol Bully
text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry cards cost (5) more next turn.
flavorText: Preventing insults with injuries.

name: Hailbringer
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Ice Shards that Freeze.
flavorText: Knows every way to greet someone.

name: Al'ar
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Ashes of Al'ar that resurrects this minion on your next turn.
flavorText: Week 679: Still no mount...

name: Jarod Shadowsong
text: Battlecry: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand by (2). Deathrattle: Summon Priestess Maiev.

name: Kur'talos Ravencrest
text: Taunt After you cast a spell, summon a 4/4 Lancer with Rush.

name: Ruststeed Raider
text: Taunt, Rush Battlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

name: Warglaives
text: Hero Power Equip the Warglaives of Azzinoth.

name: Waste Warden
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion and all others of the same minion type.
flavorText: Recycle that can, or you get the cuffs!

name: Cutting Class
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Doctor Krastinov
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavorText: He is not a medical doctor.

name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
flavorText: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

name: Jandice Barov
text: Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies when it takes damage.
flavorText: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Lake Thresher
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" "That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
text: Battlecry: Reorder your deck from the highest Cost card to the lowest Cost card.
flavorText: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

name: Ogremancer
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a 2/2 Skeleton with Taunt.
flavorText: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

name: Ras Frostwhisper
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

name: Steward of Scrolls
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

name: Vectus
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
flavorText: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

name: Arm of the Empire
text: Whenever a friendly Taunt minion is attacked, give it +2 Attack permanently.

name: Arm of the Empire
text: Whenever a friendly Taunt minion is attacked, give it +4 Attack permanently.

name: Bigfernal
text: After you summon a Demon, gain +1/+1 permanently.

name: Bigfernal
text: After you summon a Demon, gain +2/+2 permanently.

name: Cobalt Scalebane
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +6 Attack.

name: Goldgrubber
text: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+2 for each friendly Golden minion.

name: Goldgrubber
text: At the end of your turn, gain +4/+4 for each friendly Golden minion.

name: Hangry Dragon
text: At the start of your turn, gain +2/+2 if you won the last combat.

name: Hangry Dragon
text: At the start of your turn, gain +4/+4 if you won the last combat.

name: Junkbot
text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +4/+4.

name: Menagerie Jug
text: Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +2/+2.

name: Menagerie Jug
text: Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +4/+4.

name: Menagerie Magician
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +4/+4.

name: Mythrax the Unraveler
text: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+2 for each minion type you control.

name: Mythrax the Unraveler
text: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+4 for each minion type you control.

name: Phalanx Commander
text: Your Taunt minions have +4 Attack.

name: Southsea Strongarm
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Pirate +1/+1 for each Pirate you bought this turn.

name: Southsea Strongarm
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Pirate +2/+2 for each Pirate you bought this turn.

name: Tavern Tempest
text: Battlecry: Add another random Elemental to your hand.

name: Tavern Tempest
text: Battlecry: Add two other random Elementals to your hand.

name: Bloodclaw Dragon
text: Charge Whenever this attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.

name: Body of C'Thun
text: Piece of C'Thun ( /4) Summon a 6/6 C'Thun's Body with Taunt.

name: Derailed Coaster
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Rider with Rush for each minion in your hand.
flavorText: So long as it doesn’t kill you, it's considered part of the ride "experience."

name: Eye of C'Thun
text: Piece of C'Thun ( /4) Deal 7 damage randomly split among all enemies.

name: Fleethoof Pearltusk
text: Rush Corrupt: Gain +4/+4.
flavorText: Guest interactions may vary over the duration of the visit.

name: Fleethoof Pearltusk
text: Corrupted Rush

name: Heart of C'Thun
text: Piece of C'Thun ( /4) Deal 3 damage to all minions.

name: Horde Adventurer
text: Battlecry: Deliver the Scouting Reports to General Nazgrim.

name: Keywarden Ivory
text: Battlecry: Discover a dual-class spell from any class. Spellburst: Get another copy.
flavorText: She learned exactly one thing from her old man: copying.

name: King Terenas
text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.

name: Maw of C'Thun
text: Piece of C'Thun ( /4) Destroy a minion.

name: Moonfang
text: Can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavorText: Moonforehead just didn't have the same ring to it.

name: Optimistic Ogre
text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
flavorText: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

name: Ravenous Drake
text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.

name: Spirit of Kel'Thuzad
text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.

name: Steward of Scrolls
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Discover a spell.

name: Razormane Raider
text: Frenzy: Attack a random enemy.
flavorText: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owners hand.
flavorText: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.

name: Faceless Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavorText: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

name: Gurubashi Berserker
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
flavorText: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Overlord Runthak
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand.
flavorText: Knows how to lift everyone up while tearing every enemy down.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth
flavorText: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Taelan Fordring
text: Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Draw your highest-Cost minion.
flavorText: After growing up with the Scarlet Crusade for most of his life, Taelan finally realized they were maybe not the nicest people.

name: Archmage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavorText: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Lord of the Arena
text: Taunt
flavorText: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavorText: One Insane Rocketeer. One Rocket full of Explosives. Infinite Fun.

name: Argent Commander
text: Charge Divine Shield
flavorText: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavorText: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck. It's pretty insensitive.

name: Frost Elemental
text: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
flavorText: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Hogger
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavorText: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

name: Priestess of Elune
text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

name: Sunwalker
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun. It's just a name. Don’t worry!

name: The Beast
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
flavorText: He lives in Blackrock Mountain. He eats Gnomes. That's pretty much it.

name: The Black Knight
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavorText: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament. We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: Windfury Harpy
text: Windfury
flavorText: Harpies are not pleasant sounding. That's the nicest I can put it.

name: Xavius
text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
flavorText: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
flavorText: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor. He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

name: Genn Greymane
text: Start of Game: If your deck has only even- Cost cards, your starting Hero Power costs (1).
flavorText: Ever since Sylvanas killed his son, he's dreamed of getting… even.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Maexxna
text: Poisonous
flavorText: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".

name: Plague
text: Destroy all non-Skeleton minions.

name: Unrelenting Rider
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Spectral Rider for your opponent.

name: Gazlowe
text: Whenever you cast a 1-Cost spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
flavorText: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

name: Mogor the Ogre
text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

name: Piloted Sky Golem
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavorText: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

name: Toshley
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
flavorText: Something about power converters.

name: Drakonid Crusher
text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
flavorText: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?

name: Emperor Thaurissan
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavorText: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

name: Volcanic Drake
text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavorText: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.

name: Bolf Ramshield
text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
flavorText: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament. It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

name: Grand Crusader
text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
flavorText: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness. Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

name: Justicar Trueheart
text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
flavorText: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

name: Kodorider
text: Inspire: Summon a 3/5 War Kodo.
flavorText: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

name: Master Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

name: Mogor's Champion
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: This champion has learned from the best. Except for his target selection.

name: Sideshow Spelleater
text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Hero Power.
flavorText: Hey! Let me try that...

name: The Skeleton Knight
text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
flavorText: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

name: Reno Jackson
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
flavorText: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

name: Wobbling Runts
text: Deathrattle: Summon three 2/2 Runts.
flavorText: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident. They don't talk about it.

name: Ancient Harbinger
text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
flavorText: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

name: Corrupted Seer
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
flavorText: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
flavorText: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

name: Nerubian Prophet
text: At the start of your turn, reduce this card's Cost by (1).
flavorText: It’s a self-reducing prophecy.

name: Scaled Nightmare
text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
flavorText: I like it because it scales.

name: Skeram Cultist
text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavorText: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

name: Book Wyrm
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
flavorText: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".

name: Moat Lurker
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Deathrattle: Resummon it.
flavorText: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.

name: Ancient of Blossoms
text: Taunt
flavorText: His new shampoo is really working!

name: Aya Blackpaw
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

name: Big-Time Racketeer
text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Ogre.
flavorText: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

name: Defias Cleaner
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion with Deathrattle.
flavorText: His house cleaning service is quite thorough. Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

name: Fight Promoter
text: Battlecry: If you control a minion with 6 or more Health, draw two cards.
flavorText: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles. No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

name: Leatherclad Hogleader
text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
flavorText: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

name: Madam Goya
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
flavorText: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

name: Wind-up Burglebot
text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw a card.
flavorText: Don't blame the bot for his crimes... Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

name: Wrathion
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
flavorText: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon. Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask? WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

name: Frozen Crusher
text: After this minion attacks, Freeze it.
flavorText: Goes by the online handle "KoolKrusher99."

name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3) or less.
flavorText: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

name: Sabretooth Stalker
text: Stealth
flavorText: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

name: Bone Drake
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
flavorText: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

name: Furnacefire Colossus
text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
flavorText: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

name: Necrotic Geist
text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavorText: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

name: Nerubian Unraveler
text: Spells cost (2) more.
flavorText: He loves a good yarn.

name: Skulking Geist
text: Battlecry: Destroy all 1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
flavorText: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

name: Spellweaver
text: Spell Damage +2
flavorText: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

name: Hungry Ettin
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
flavorText: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

name: Spiteful Summoner
text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavorText: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

name: Mossy Horror
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

name: Arcane Dynamo
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (5) or more.
flavorText: We ran out of jars, so we started putting brains in other stuff.

name: Damaged Stegotron
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

name: Giggling Inventor
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

name: Mechanical Whelp
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Mechanical Dragon.
flavorText: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

name: Missile Launcher
text: Magnetic At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other characters.
flavorText: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

name: Spark Drill
text: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
flavorText: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

name: Mojomaster Zihi
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 5 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Sadly, she was still two credits short of her Witch Doctorate.

name: Eccentric Scribe
text: Deathrattle: Summon four 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
flavorText: Them’s fightin’ words!

name: Mad Summoner
text: Battlecry: Fill each player's board with 1/1 Imps.
flavorText: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Portal Overfiend
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavorText: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Safeguard
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 0/5 Vault Safe with Taunt.
flavorText: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

name: Unseen Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Violet Warden
text: Taunt Spell Damage +1
flavorText: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Blatant Decoy
text: Deathrattle: Each player summons the lowest Cost minion from their hand.
flavorText: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

name: Khartut Defender
text: Taunt, Reborn Deathrattle: Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Gesundheit!

name: Camouflaged Dirigible
text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your next turn.
flavorText: "What does that cloud look like to you?" "Trouble."

name: Evasive Wyrm
text: Divine Shield, Rush Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Gyrocopter
text: Rush Windfury
flavorText: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

name: Kronx Dragonhoof
text: Battlecry: Draw Galakrond. If you're already Galakrond, unleash a Devastation.
flavorText: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
flavorText: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
flavorText: "I will find you, sky!"

name: Scavenging Shivarra
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all other minions.
flavorText: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

name: Emperor Thaurissan
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavorText: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Onyx Magescribe
text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to your hand.
flavorText: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

name: Smug Senior
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a 5/7 Ghost with Taunt to your hand.
flavorText: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

name: Sorcerous Substitute
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

name: Spectral Senior
text: Taunt

name: Cap'n Hoggarr
text: After you buy a Pirate, gain 1 Gold this turn only.

name: Cap'n Hoggarr
text: After you buy a Pirate, gain 2 Gold this turn only.

name: Drakonid Enforcer
text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2/+2.

name: Drakonid Enforcer
text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +4/+4.

name: Dread Admiral Eliza
text: Whenever a friendly Pirate attacks, give all friendly minions +2/+1.

name: Dread Admiral Eliza
text: Whenever a friendly Pirate attacks, give all friendly minions +4/+2.

name: Gentle Djinni
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon another random Elemental and add a copy of it to your hand.

name: Gentle Djinni
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon two other random Elementals and add copies of them to your hand.

name: King Bagurgle
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give your other Murlocs +2/+2.

name: King Bagurgle
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give your other Murlocs +4/+4.

name: Lightfang Enforcer
text: At the end of your turn, give a friendly minion of each minion type +2/+2.

name: Lightfang Enforcer
text: At the end of your turn, give a friendly minion of each minion type +4/+4.

name: Maexxna
text: Poisonous

name: Majordomo Executus
text: At the end of your turn, give your left-most minion +1/+1. Repeat for each Elemental you played this turn.

name: Majordomo Executus
text: At the end of your turn, give your left-most minion +2/+2. Repeat for each Elemental you played this turn.

name: Nadina the Red
text: Deathrattle: Give your Dragons Divine Shield.

name: Nadina the Red
text: Deathrattle: Give your Dragons Divine Shield.

name: Piloted Sky Golem
text: Deathrattle: Summon two random 4-Cost minions.

name: Piloted Sky Golem
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 4-Cost minion.

name: Qiraji Harbinger
text: After a friendly minion with Taunt dies, give its neighbors +2/+2.

name: Qiraji Harbinger
text: After a friendly minion with Taunt dies, give its neighbors +4/+4.

name: The Beast
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.

name: Twilight Emissary
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give a friendly Dragon +2/+2.

name: Twilight Emissary
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give a friendly Dragon +4/+4.

name: Wildfire Elemental
text: After this attacks and kills a minion, deal excess damage to a random adjacent minion.

name: Wildfire Elemental
text: After this attacks and kills a minion, deal excess damage to both adjacent minions.

name: Yo-Ho-Ogre
text: Taunt After this minion survives being attacked, attack immediately.

name: Yo-Ho-Ogre
text: Taunt After this minion survives being attacked, attack immediately.

name: C'Thun's Body
text: Taunt

name: Claw Machine
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Draw a minion and give it +3/+3.
flavorText: "I have been mrglrlglr… chosen!"

name: High Priest Rohan
text: At the end of your turn, summon two friendly minions that died this game.

name: Varok Saurfang
text: Charge After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 4 damage to the enemy hero.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavorText: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck. It's pretty insensitive.

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavorText: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

name: Core Hound
flavorText: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavorText: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: War Golem
flavorText: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them. Instinct, maybe? A desire to blend in?

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Barrens Stablehand
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
flavorText: It’s never Huffer.

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavorText: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
text: Stealth
flavorText: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold. He'll take care of the rest.

name: Locust Swarm
text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions. Restore 3 Health to your hero.

name: Dr. Boom
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
flavorText: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

name: Troggzor the Earthinator
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
flavorText: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

name: Rend Blackhand
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
flavorText: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.

name: Captured Jormungar
flavorText: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

name: Chillmaw
text: Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavorText: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

name: Skycap'n Kragg
text: Charrrrrge Costs (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
flavorText: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat? NOTHING.

name: Bog Creeper
text: Taunt
flavorText: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
text: Windfury
flavorText: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavorText: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
text: Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
flavorText: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

name: Twin Emperor Vek'nilash
text: Taunt

name: Black Queen
text: Auto-Attack: Deal 4 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

name: The Curator
text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
flavorText: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

name: White Queen
text: Auto-Attack: Deal 4 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

name: Don Han'Cho
text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavorText: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

name: Blazecaller
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
flavorText: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

name: Sated Threshadon
text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
flavorText: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

name: Stormwatcher
text: Windfury
flavorText: Aspiring meteorologist!

name: Volcanosaur
text: Battlecry: Adapt, then Adapt.
flavorText: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

name: Corridor Creeper
text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is in your hand.
flavorText: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

name: Silver Vanguard
text: Deathrattle: Recruit an 8-Cost minion.
flavorText: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

name: Azalina Soulthief
text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's.
flavorText: The cards are always golden on the other side.

name: Countess Ashmore
text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush, Lifesteal, and Deathrattle card from your deck.
flavorText: "1 minion… ah, ah, ah! 2 minions… ah, ah, ah! 3 minions… ah, ah, ah!"

name: Darkmire Moonkin
text: Spell Damage +2
flavorText: Birds of a feather Moonfire together.

name: Furious Ettin
text: Taunt
flavorText: One head is a morning person. The other head hates morning people.

name: Worgen Abomination
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other damaged minions.
flavorText: Does anyone want to play dead!?

name: Wyrmguard
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: They think they're trusted guardians. Dragons think they're convenient snacks.

name: Star Aligner
text: Battlecry: If you control 3 minions with 7 Health, deal 7 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: "You're a Sagittarius? Me too! Just gimme a sec."

name: Amani War Bear
text: Rush Taunt
flavorText: "I used to farm for hours! Now they just come in packs?"

name: Crowd Roaster
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 7 damage to an enemy minion.
flavorText: Every major show has an opening act to warm up the crowd.

name: Linecracker
text: Overkill: Double this minion's Attack.
flavorText: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

name: Rabble Bouncer
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.
flavorText: "Shirt? Shoes!? No service!"

name: Chef Nomi
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire Elementals.
flavorText: His cooking is always very well done.

name: Exotic Mountseller
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random 3-Cost Beast.
flavorText: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

name: Tunnel Blaster
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavorText: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Murky's Battle Horn
text: Summon 7 Murlocs and give them Rush. At the start of your next turn, do it again.

name: Siamat
text: Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).
flavorText: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Wasteland Scorpid
text: Poisonous
flavorText: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

name: Wrapped Golem
text: Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavorText: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

name: Evasive Drakonid
text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

name: Shu'ma
text: At the end of your turn, fill your board with 1/1 Tentacles.
flavorText: How to tell your mother to go away.

name: Bonechewer Vanguard
text: Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

name: Felcracked Colossus
text: Taunt

name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
flavorText: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”

name: The Curator
text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
flavorText: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

name: Keymaster Alabaster
text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, add a copy to your hand that costs (1).
flavorText: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Murozond
text: Battlecry: Add a minion from your last opponent's warband to your hand.

name: Murozond
text: Battlecry: Add a minion from your last opponent's warband to your hand. Make it Golden!

name: Nat Pagle, Extreme Angler
text: When this attacks and kills a minion, add a random minion to your hand.

name: Nat Pagle, Extreme Angler
text: When this attacks and kills a minion, add 2 random minions to your hand.

name: Nomi, Kitchen Nightmare
text: After you play an Elemental, Elementals in Bob's Tavern have +1/+1 for the rest of the game.

name: Nomi, Kitchen Nightmare
text: After you play an Elemental, Elementals in Bob's Tavern have +2/+2 for the rest of the game.

name: Sated Threshadon
text: Deathrattle: Summon three 2/2 Murlocs.

name: Seabreaker Goliath
text: Windfury Overkill: Give your other Pirates +2/+2.

name: Seabreaker Goliath
text: Mega-Windfury Overkill: Give your other Pirates +4/+4.

name: The Tide Razor
text: Deathrattle: Summon 3 random Pirates.

name: The Tide Razor
text: Deathrattle: Summon 6 random Pirates.

name: Silas Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
flavorText: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

name: Strongman
text: Taunt Corrupt: This costs (0).
flavorText: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Barrens Stablehand
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
flavorText: It’s never Huffer.

name: Nozdormu the Eternal
text: Start of Game: If this is in BOTH players' decks, turns  are only 15 seconds long.
flavorText: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Stormwatcher
text: Windfury
flavorText: Aspiring meteorologist!

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavorText: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: Arcane Devourer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.

name: Gruul
text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavorText: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller". He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Chains
text: Hero Power Take control of a random enemy minion until end of turn.

name: Chains
text: Hero Power Take control of a random enemy minion.

name: Kel'Thuzad
text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavorText: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

name: Foe Reaper 4000
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.
flavorText: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

name: Force-Tank MAX
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

name: Sneed's Old Shredder
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavorText: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

name: V-07-TR-0N
text: Charge Mega-Windfury

name: Chromaggus
text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
flavorText: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.

name: Fossilized Devilsaur
text: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain Taunt.

text: Divine Shield, Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
